content.question: The figure shows three cases where two spheres are touching and attract each other with the gravitational force. The radii of the spheres in each case are shown. All of the spheres are made of material with the same density. Which of the following correctly ranks these cases based on the gravitational force between the spheres?

choices.label: <math alttext="open parenthesis, A equals B, close parenthesis, is greater than C" overflow="scroll"><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo> </mo><mo>=</mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo><mo> </mo><mo>></mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="A is greater than C, which is greater than B" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo> </mo><mo>></mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo> </mo><mo>></mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></math>

<math alttext="B is greater than C, which is greater than A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo> </mo><mo>></mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo> </mo><mo>></mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

<math alttext="C is greater than, open parenthesis, A equals B, close parenthesis" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo> </mo><mo>></mo><mo> </mo><mpadded><mo>(</mo><mpadded><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi><mo> </mo><mo>=</mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi></mpadded><mo>)</mo></mpadded></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="B is greater than C, which is greater than A" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi><mo> </mo><mo>></mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mo> </mo><mo>></mo><mo> </mo><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>

skill.text: 2.A: Derive a symbolic expression from known quantities by selecting and following a logical mathematical pathway.
